author: Staff Reporter
text:
A labourer was murdered by his three brothers and cash of Rs. 3.90 lakh kept in the house was stolen by them here on Monday night.

Govindaraj (65) of Thirumalaigiri and Kuppaiyee alias Pappa (60) has four sons, Eswaran (31), Chennimalai (26), Chandran (24) and Palaniappan (20). Govindaraj died and the 16 cent land was sold for Rs. 19 lakh on Monday.

The money was equally divided among the four brothers with each getting Rs. 3.90 lakh.

While the three brothers used the money to settle their dues, Chennimalai took the money to the house.

On Monday night, Chennimalai was found dead in his house with his head smashed with stone.

The Steel Plant police rushed to the spot and sent the body to Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital.

Inquiries revealed that since the three brothers had no money, they had asked Chennimalai to give them Rs. 1 lakh each.

Since Chennimalai refused, the three murdered him and fled with the cash.

The police arrested Eswaran and Palaniappan and a search is on for Chandran. Investigations are on .
title: Two held for murder
